constraints.name: old_paradigm_structure
constraints.notes: Original conception: bidirectional flow through Corpus Callosum | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): old_system = T_int ↔ C_c ↔ T_ext

constraints.name: old_t_int_responsibilities
constraints.notes: Old Internal Tract: reflection-oriented | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): old_T_int = {memory, planning, self_modeling, meta_learning}

constraints.name: old_t_ext_responsibilities
constraints.notes: Old External Tract: action-oriented | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): old_T_ext = {sensing, actuation, real_time_response, world_modeling}

constraints.name: limitation_no_user_concern_alignment
constraints.notes: Users don't care about internal reflection vs external action | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ¬aligned(old_system, user_concerns)

constraints.name: limitation_no_component_mapping
constraints.notes: No clear mapping (e.g., which tract is Neo4j?) | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ¬∃ mapping : Components → {T_int, T_ext}

constraints.name: limitation_anthropomorphic_projection
constraints.notes: Mirrors left/right hemispheres, assumes human-like consciousness | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): models(old_system, biological_brain)

constraints.name: limitation_no_justification
constraints.notes: Architecture doesn't explain why it exists | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ¬∃ reason : explains_why(old_system)

constraints.name: paradigm_is_inadequate
constraints.notes: Old paradigm doesn't align with AI reality or user needs | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ¬suitable(old_system, AI_systems) ∧ ¬suitable(old_system, user_interaction)
